segments.text: What are you two doing in here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We heard you weren't feeling well , so we came to check on you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was sitting there giving out nametags and all of a sudden , there she was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who , Femi ? Yeah , Yi-jun saw her inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All these memories of prom night came back to me . I had to be alone . You remember that night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I remember someone spiked my punch . You sat with me in the girl's bathroom ...
segments.speaker: S2
